text: Ashley Spencer (born March 8, 1985) is an American actress, singer, and dancer. Most of her acting is on stage. She had performed on Broadway in Grease, Hairspray and Rock of Ages. Spencer was a contestant on the 2007 NBC program Grease: You're the One that I Want! She was the understudy for Barbie in the Barbie in Fairytopi atour. On that tour, she sang and danced ballet. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American stage actors Category:Reality television participants Category:Singers from Ohio Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Canton, Ohio
title: Ashley Spencer (actress)
